csl:
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="in-text"
      version="1.0"
      xml:lang="en">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <citation>
    <layout>
      <date prefix="(" suffix=")" variable="issued">
        <date-part form="long" name="month" />
        <date-part name="day" suffix=", " />
        <date-part name="year" />
      </date>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
